headline: ETF investors, here’s why you should choose funds listed in Canada and not the U.S. - The Globe and Mail

annotations.paragraph: Welcome to The Globe and Mail’s comment community. This is a space where subscribers can engage with each other and Globe staff. Non-subscribers can read and sort comments but will not be able to engage with them in any way. Click here to subscribe.
annotations.reason: This paragraph is about the comment community and subscription details, not about ETF investments.

annotations.paragraph: If you would like to write a letter to the editor, please forward it to letters@globeandmail.com. Readers can also interact with The Globe on Facebook and Twitter .
